statements: SELECT * FROM customer_feedback_table;
SELECT customer_id, feedback FROM customer_feedback_table WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback_table ORDER BY rating DESC, timestamp DESC;
SELECT feedback, rating FROM customer_feedback_table WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT customer_id, timestamp FROM customer_feedback_table WHERE feedback LIKE '%great%';
SELECT customer_id, feedback, rating, timestamp FROM customer_feedback_table WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_id, rating, timestamp FROM customer_feedback_table WHERE feedback LIKE '%great%' ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback_table WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' AND timestamp < '2022-06-01' ORDER BY timestamp;
SELECT MAX(rating) AS highest_rating FROM customer_feedback_table;
SELECT AVG(rating) AS average_rating, COUNT(customer_id) AS total_customers FROM customer_feedback_table WHERE rating >= 2;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback_table;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback_table ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT rating, customer_id, feedback_date FROM customer_feedback_table WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT recommendation_text, recommendation_date FROM product_recommendations WHERE recommendation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-04-30';
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(recommendation_id) AS num_recommendations FROM product_recommendations GROUP BY customer_id HAVING num_recommendations > 1;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback_table WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM customer_feedback_table WHERE feedback_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY feedback_date ASC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) as total_recommendations FROM product_recommendations GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_recommendations > 5;
SELECT customer_id, recommendation_text, recommendation_date FROM product_recommendations WHERE customer_id = 123 ORDER BY recommendation_date DESC;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM customer_feedback_table WHERE feedback_date > '2021-01-01' AND rating < 4 ORDER BY customer_id ASC LIMIT 10 OFFSET 5;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT * FROM product_recommendations WHERE recommendation_score > 4.5;
SELECT recommendation_text, recommendation_score FROM product_recommendations ORDER BY recommendation_score DESC;
SELECT strategy_name, strategy_description FROM marketing_strategies WHERE strategy_type = 'digital';
SELECT strategy_id, strategy_name, strategy_type FROM marketing_strategies ORDER BY strategy_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY feedback_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT recommendation_text, recommendation_score FROM product_recommendations WHERE recommendation_score >= 8 ORDER BY recommendation_score DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT strategy_name, strategy_description FROM marketing_strategies WHERE strategy_type = 'Digital' ORDER BY strategy_id;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_date FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY feedback_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text, rating FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_phone FROM CustomerData WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT product_id, recommendation_text, recommendation_type FROM ProductRecommendations WHERE recommended_for_customer_id = 2004;
SELECT marketing_content, marketing_date FROM PersonalizedMarketing ORDER BY marketing_date ASC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM CustomerData ORDER BY customer_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY feedback_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_id, recommendation_text, recommendation_type FROM ProductRecommendations WHERE recommended_for_customer_id = 123 ORDER BY product_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT marketing_id, marketing_content FROM PersonalizedMarketing WHERE target_customer_id = 456 ORDER BY marketing_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM CustomerData WHERE customer_email LIKE '%@gmail.com%' ORDER BY customer_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback ORDER BY date_received DESC;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE satisfaction_rating > 3;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM product_info WHERE price < 50.00;
SELECT customer_id, age, location FROM customer_profile WHERE location LIKE '%City%';
SELECT customer_id, recommended_product_id, date_sent FROM recommendation_history ORDER BY date_sent ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE satisfaction_rating > 3 ORDER BY date_received DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text, satisfaction_rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE satisfaction_rating < 2 ORDER BY satisfaction_rating ASC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM product_info WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, location FROM customer_profile WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT * FROM purchase_history WHERE product_id = 3 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC LIMIT 5;
